location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting an extract from the Proceedings of the Governor in the Military Department dated 9 April 1814, regarding a mistake discovered in the invoice of the muskets shipped on board the Lord Mintoand received by the Residency at Bushire on 30 November 1812 (invoice enclosed).
